title: Task 51

question.text: What does Sophie suggest that the team do?

answers.feedback: Sophie's suggestion is about setting standards, not stopping the use of languages.
She suggests starting with defining standards, not immediate implementation.

answers.answer: To hire more programmers for the project
answers.feedback: Her recommendation is about coding standards, not expanding the team.

answers.answer: To begin by defining coding standards for various languages

dialogue.text: I recommend that we start by defining coding standards for different programming languages we use.

description: Coding standards are like rules for writing computer code. Think of it as agreeing on how to build a brick model, so everyone uses the same colors and steps. This makes it easier for everyone to understand and work together.
